title: Hands-on Labs
subtitle: Experience hands-on learning in various technology fields
description: Experience and learn real technologies through various hands-on programs provided at the conference.

walkthroughs.title: Web Development Lab
walkthroughs.description: Practice full-stack web application development using React and Node.js.

walkthroughs.title: Machine Learning Lab
walkthroughs.description: Create an image classification model using Python and TensorFlow.

walkthroughs.title: Cloud Deployment Lab
walkthroughs.description: Practice deploying applications to the cloud using AWS.

walkthroughs.title: Data Analysis Lab
walkthroughs.description: Analyze and visualize data using Pandas and Matplotlib.
